script.line: Prota arrives a the Festi-Ball just in time to see...
Besto!
Prota! Where've you been?!
Everywhere.
Well I've been looking all over for you!
You have?
Yeah! I thought you'd come back to the lab after you found Minty!
Me and Marbels had to put everything together ourselves, we were really worried about you.
Why didn't you come back?
Beause I still haven't found Minty!
What? Oh no...
Well, I put up copies of our poster all over the Festi-Ball. If she's here, someone'll find her.
Thanks, Besto. I really appreciate it. How's the Festi-Ball going so far?
Great! In fact, now that Marbels and I are done setting up, I was just gonna go catch the end of your Mom's match!
The match! Oh no, I missed it?
Not if we hurry! Let's go!
Prota! Besto! Over here!
Croco! Hey!
Hey Prota! Twice in one day! Any luck finding Minty?
Not yet, unfortunately. But I wanted to catch the end of Mom's match.
Then you arrived just in time! Your Mom's doing great! The Mustard Fox  doesn't stand a chance!
I think she's about to hit her finishing move!
Rahhhh!!!
Go Mom!
Go Prota's Mom!
Oh my gosh! She's setting up for Eat Your Vegetables!
Haha yeah, she does that all the time around the house. Go Mom!
She's going to the top rope!
This is amazing. Wait for it...
Wait for it....
AAAAAAAAH!!! SHE'S SO COOL!
...One! ...Two! ...THREE!
And the crowd goes WILD!
That was amazing. It must be so cool to have a pro wrestler for a Mom!
It is! And my Dad's pretty cool too. He works at the daycare.
Oh yeah? That's neat! I--oh! Oh, shh, let's listen.
Mom addresses the crowd, microphone in hand.
FINALLY...
The Festi-Ball has come back to Pomegranate Village.
And the crowd cheers!
Yay!
Tonight, we're doing more than celebrating our community.
We're doing more than wrestling matches, feasting on delicious sandwiches and partying to the wee hours.
TONIGHT... on behalf of our cherished Ball Museum, we're unveiling a new, show-stopping attraction...
The likes of which have NEVER been seen before...
This is the best. This is the best!!
Tonight, I unveil something truly special. Something big. Something I know you're gonna love.
Yes yes yes!
So let me just ask you, Pomegranate Village...
Are you ready to Festi-Ball?!
Yeah!
Woooooooooooooo!!!
That's what I thought. So without further ado, I give you...
THE WORLD'S MOST COLOURFUL BALL OF YARN!
Okay I'll just watch this and then I swear I'm gonna find Minty.
I'm so excited I could pop!
This is gonna be rad.
And here...we...BALL!
What the--
That's no ball...
THAT'S MY PUP!
Bark!
MINTY?! What are you doing--
I gotta get her!
Prota wait, don't--...climb up there.
What--Prota?!
Mom! Hi! Bad news I lost Minty! Good news I'm about to get her back!
If I can catch her!
Bark!
If?! Honey, let's make sure you do! Get after her! Use that hold I taught you!
I'm on it!
